I love design, technology, pixels, grids, data, type & language. I get to play with all of these things at Topguest where I’m the lead UX designer.

Topguest

As the lead (and solo) designer at Topguest I am responsible for the product across all platforms; strategy, UX, visual design, and front-end implementation.

UTS:Newsroom

Design & UX with Mark Elizondo, and all front-end development while at Digital Eskimo

Sketch Lab

An experimental installation built with Wii remotes, a custom infra-red pen, a projector, and a repurposed architects table. A collaborative effort while a Digital Eskimo. I was involved with all aspects of the ongoing project including prototyping, testing, build, hardware, interface design and processing code.

Logo design

Designed at Icelab.

Billy Hughes at War

Design and front-end development with Max Wheeler at Icelab. Highly commended in the Macfarlane Prize for excellence in web design and the 2009 MAPDA Awards.

Indigenous Community Volunteers

Design and development at Icelab.
